data.name: Ruth's Journey
data.detailed_description:
A First-Person Narrative Adventure:



Play as Ruth as she ventures into the forest in search of the highly sought after Golden Finch.
Sitting in her office all day long, stamping papers, Ruth's boss finally grants her a break and an opportunity to use her talents to save the company from financial ruin.

Initially intended as a Demo for the Dementia inspired Adventure game “The Long Way Home”, Ruth’s Journey turned into a standalone title in the same Universe.

The game features themes such as work life balance, nature photography and mental health.
Set in 1960s Canada, Ruth’s Journey is a love letter to Nature & Wildlive and Analog Photography.


KEY FEATURES
  • Experience the peace and tranquility of the forest
  • Capture breathtaking pictures with your Analog Camera
  • Beautiful low-poly aesthetic
  • Immersive First Person Controls
  • Fully Animated Characters & Cutscenes
  • Full English Voice Acting by Mallory Echelmeyer, James Alexander & Sarah Golding
  • Original Soundtrack by Mirjam Skal
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Embark on a journey with Ruth, an adventurous hobbyist photographer, as she escapes her boring office job to chase down the rare Golden Finch.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mojave 2015
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
